Great game, I used to play it back in the PSX/PS1 days. Way ahead of its time (and one of the few true 3D RTS games of the era). If you liked starcraft, you should like this. Great job from the folks running the project at wz2100.net. Still an active multiplayer community. Shame there aren't any images on this store page, it's really aged well! 

P.S. its cross platform, and still thriving in multiplayer. Get on IRC or discord to arrange a game if the lobby seems slow!
summary: Old but timeless RTS game, way ahead of its time!

description: Graphics not that good but gameplay is awesome.
This is not the stable version. The stable version can be found elsewhere in the repository.
it's controls are very fast, The tankers and other weapons are very good. I enjoyed the game very much

the devs have made the AIs unbeatable. I have been trying to play a simply EASY skirmish game for a week ane every time, I get wrecked by every AI on every setting. I've tried each AI in turn, one at a time, on each difficulty setting. and every time, they rush me en-masse and obliterate me. the only way I've been able to win a single match is by using debug and cheating.

and before you wonder if I'm just a bad sport, I've been playing this game off and on for 10 years. it only the last few updates that broke the game. and no. I wont go back to the old versions. this experience has soured me so bad.

this game is no longer fun. I hope the devs get scurvy.

A new version. 3.4.0 Only now, once again, I don't know where to put my custom maps. The entire directory structure changed. Hopefully for the next update, somebody will have a pre established directory for MAPS and MODS on a specific path where the number doesn't change or go away.

Can anybody tell me where the maps are supposed to be copied to in this version?

If anyone want to join a game multiplayer I not recomended it for anyone.
because you can't get a good teammate. if you noob I recomended you to
play with bot in skirmish to get more strategic, because The hosting can kick you or you can't win, other player have more more startegic,

if you want install an addons in warzone2100 like maps or mods:
warzone2100 maps folder: /home/your_user_name/.local/share/warzone2100(version)/maps or /home/your_user_name/.warzone2100(version)/maps
warzone2100 mods folder: /home/your_user_name/.local/share/warzone2100(version)/mods/autoload(if you want use the mod), to downloads or /home/your_user_name/.warzone2100(version)/mods/autoload(if you want use the mod), to downloads

More Instruction or the newer version check in the warzone2100 web:
wz2100.net, get an addons: addons.wz2100.net, the forums: forums.wz2100.net

This game is a great RTS with elements I really enjoy. The ability to design vehicles isn't something I've ever come across before in any other RTS, and is one of the strong points of the game. The controls and layout are solid and it's easy on the eyes. The problem comes when trying to pay against an AI opponent. Even on the easy difficulty, it somehow is able to quickly amass a much more powerful army before I can even get myself situated. I would love to play more of this game, but the fact that the AI can decimate you in 10 minutes even on easy prevents me from fully enjoying this game.

It is fun to play this at times but in an Intel based computer you must replace the "amd-ucode" by putting the "intel-ucode" (from Intel, which I have) it goes in the "/usr/lib/firmware" directory then in Terminal you enter "echo > 1 /sys/devices/system/cpu/microcode/reload" and press the Enter key then exit the Terminal and restart the computer. Everything works a lot better with the Intel CPU and chipset after that.

Custom maps are apain in the arse to get running. Everytime there is a major update to this one has to relearn how to add mods and maps.

Why can't the install routine create the maps and mods directories, and inform us at the end, where it put them?

I have bought AoE, and many other strategy games like factorio. But I always come back to it. This was one of the few good games available in linux back in the days, which is why I got hooked on to it years ago. I still play it after all these years. Wish someone would pick up the development. Even if it becomes a paid app, I am willing to pay for it

Por otro lado hay un bug que no han corregido y está desde hace varias versiones: en modo compaña, hay un momento en que la selección de unidades deja de funcionar, no deja seleccionar nada. Por lo demás, la única queja que tengo es que es demasiado adictivo. ;-)

Un petit jeu de RTS où ça canarde, bombarde etc. Très prenant.
Plusieurs préconisations :
 - Télécharger les vidéos sur le site officiel (en qualité standard ça fera l'affaire et les mettre dans le local/share d'installation), sinon vous ne comprendrez rien au scénario des campagnes et parfois même ce qu'il y a à faire
 - Dès la première mission fouillez bien et regardez ce que vous pouvez faire (il faut construire des usines car vos unités disponibles ne seront pas suffisantes et vous vous ferez éclater), la règle est de ne jamais être passif
 - En découle un jeu assez âpre même en normal, avec un timing serré notamment les missions d'expédition, il ne faut pas perdre son temps. Conserver toujours une sauvegarde de début de mission au cas où vous vous rendez compte que c'est impossible de finir dans le timing imparti. Un bon départ de mission est essentielle si on veut pouvoir la finir. Une mauvaise stratégie dès le début de mission et c'est quasi sûr que vous n'y arriverez pas. Certaines maps proposent plusieurs chemins à l'objectif, essayer de changer si vous n'arrivez pas à finir la mission.

J'aime beaucoup le concept de "tuning" des unités même si au final on finit par ne garder que les meilleures technologies. Le jeu est assez rude, pas conseillé à tout le monde. La sélection des unités est assez pénible et ça manque d'options (ex : ne sélectionner que les unités armées). Enfin, dommage que le jeu ne propose pas de textures HD, pourtant le moteur a été mis à jour pour supporter Vulkan. Il y a bien des mods sur le site officiel mais pour des modèles 3D bien précis, et donc éparpillés en plusieurs mods.
Сыроватая, страшноватая графика даже для опенсорса, запутанная. Понравилось разнообразие вооружения и широкие возможности модификации юнитов. Когда не во что поиграть можно играть в это.
